DOC.brief_summary: The Cologne Cohort of Neutropenic Patients (CoCoNut) is a non-interventional cohort study assessing risk factors, interventions, and outcome of immunosuppressed patients with or without opportunistic infections.
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort was established with the aim of a comprehensive data collection of all patients developing neutropenia after receiving chemotherapy for any kind of malignant disease, treated in the University Hospital of Cologne.
